trends.title: RBI Mandates Stricter KYC for Digital Lenders
trends.summary: The Reserve Bank of India has announced comprehensive new KYC requirements affecting over 500 fintech lenders across India. Companies must achieve full compliance within 90 days or face regulatory penalties.

source_articles.title: Fintech Lenders Rush to Hire Compliance Heads After RBI Circular
RegTech Startups See 3x Demand as RBI KYC Deadline Looms
RBI Governor Warns on KYC Compliance Gaps at Digital Lenders
RBI Tightens KYC: NBFCs Must Submit Compliance Plans by March

impact.pitch_angle: Expert insights on RBI Mandates Stricter KYC for Digital Lenders...

call_sheets.trend_title: RBI mandates stricter KYC for digital lenders, impacting Lendingkart, Capital Float, ZestMoney, and Paytm Lending. This leads to increased compliance costs and potential customer acquisition hurdles. Tier-2 digital payment processors and SME-focused fintech lenders are indirectly affected through delayed payments and increased regulatory scrutiny. Eventually, microfinance institutions and rural cooperatives face reduced access to credit and higher operating costs.
call_sheets.contact_role: Compliance Head / VP Legal / Regulatory Affairs Director

Eventually, microfinance institutions and rural cooperatives face reduced access to credit and higher operating costs. — RBI mandates stricter KYC for digital lenders, impacting Lendingkart, Capital Fl
call_sheets.opening_line: Lendingkart faces a concrete challenge: direct regulation. This will likely materialize within 2 weeks. We help companies navigate exactly this kind of pressure.
